answer.details: "[Modern Mask](https://www.portseattle.org/page/modern-mask)" by James Schoppert is a 3' tall painted wood sculpture.

5QyJ9U1ucyNVrED6DJ7rC.clue: Find the painted wood sculpture "Modern Mask." How many faces stare back at you?

answer.details: "[Journey Home](https://www.portseattle.org/page/journey-home-larry-kirkland)" by Larry Kirkland is a 32' long boat made out of aluminum and glass. The shadow is made from approximately seventy bronze elements.

5RY2CaPBQ0ebzQqtrMH97.clue: Find the shadow in the terrazzo floor. What object casts the shadow?

answer.details: If planes are taking off from right to left, the airport is in south flow. If planes are taking off from left to right, the airport is in north flow.

5YifmtYjD9kA9_ZjAXsPR.clue: Watch a few planes take off. Based on the takeoff direction, what flow is the airport in today?
5YifmtYjD9kA9_ZjAXsPR.hint: Airport flow is the direction airplanes take off toward. For example, if planes take off toward the south, the airport is in south flow.

7fp8LTXwpYKOjPevcL36u.clue: You've got a postcard to mail. Where in the Central Terminal can you buy postage stamps?

7gd4XfTbP4F6JmxyFTTeZ.clue: Find the water bottle filler with the highest number of bottles saved, and take a photo of the bottle count.

answer.details:

* Village Pub
* Skillet
* Beecher's Handmade Cheese
* SkyGamerz

answer.details:
The lounges are:

* Delta (A11)
* Delta One (A11)
* The Club (A11)
* United (A10)
* Delta (A1)
* American Express Centurion (Central Terminal)
* Alaska (C16)
* Alaska (D1)
* Alaska (mezzanine above N13-N18)
* The Club (above S10)
* British Airways (above S10).

V0UJV_37iQO6UiE0o5FsU.clue: Take a photo outside the entrance of each airport lounge.
V0UJV_37iQO6UiE0o5FsU.hint: There are eleven lounges at SEA, with ten entrances.

WJ94F0WvEpw7yN6IVR8c3.clue: Chester is the name of the face on the tail of Alaska Airlines airplanes. Look out the window at gate C17. How many Chester faces can you see?

answer.details: Gate B21 is accessed using the escalator or elevator at the end of Concourse B, near Gate B15.

WR8DZANfLKaOK8pJM11Sl.clue: Past Gate B15, there's an escalator to a tucked-away gate area. What's the highest-numbered B gate there?

answer.details: The artwork by Dan Friday depicts Mount Baker and a bear, celebrating the natural beauty of the Pacific Northwest.

Wgum7i0RoluKYX8rnam67.clue: What mountain and animal are shown in the art by Dan Friday hanging near the Mountain Room Bar?

answer.details: The art is hanging on the wall outside the all-gender restrooms.

Z1FASo8jIVIjvxTKvnBXX.clue: Ride the yellow line train. How many fire extinguishers are mounted to the wall in the tunnel?
Z1FASo8jIVIjvxTKvnBXX.hint: Count only extinguishers mounted to the tunnel wall; the one on the train does not count.

answer.answer: At the Washington Lotto desk near gate C10.

ZFa35g9EoOt4RcP7zltUn.clue: If you hit the jackpot, where in Concourse C would you cash your Washington Lotto ticket?

answer.answer: Cordell works at the Luck Shines shoe shine near gate D2.

bGUEjTb-qWFkoRKOKl27F.clue: Take a photo of a Japanese sandwich.

answer.details: "[cloudsandclunkers](https://www.portseattle.org/page/cloudsandclunkers-peter-shelton)" by Peter Shelton hangs above Concourse A near Seattle Beer Union.

bdhG4xPpHjfcnlQxjPFky.clue: Look up near Seattle Beer Union. How many cloud sculptures are floating above you?

bgkOlbXT8DN3B9hXCjJ-p.clue: Check the gate signs around the airport. How many gates have a letter after the number?

cfjLLFrc-2woBd8Uq694I.clue: Take a photo of something with the Space Needle on it.

answer.details:
The information desks are:

- A info: across from Swarovski in Concourse A
- A3 info: across from Starbucks by Gate A3
- Checkpoint 1: inside Checkpoint 1 on the landing between Concourse A and the A train station
- A train: in the A train station
- Central info: in the central terminal near Dilettante Chocolates & Mocha Cafe
- D info: Across from the all-gender restrooms in Concourse D
- D train: in the D train station
- N info: in the North Satellite

cvw4layL7wI_AVYjDy2vv.clue: Take a photo at every information desk.
cvw4layL7wI_AVYjDy2vv.hint: There are eight information desks post-security.

e6AnH10fHCD2QHx6V14vA.clue: Listen to SEA Tower and take a photo of a plane you heard cleared for takeoff.

answer.details: ["Blackleaf"](https://www.portseattle.org/page/blackleaf-deborah-butterfield) is seven feet tall, and is a part of Butterfield's bronze cast collection of works and represents a standing horse.

eNu3Q7QBpjKpsBfnQoz8d.clue: Find the "Blackleaf" statue by Deborah Butterfield. What is it made of?

answer.details: It takes nine minutes to walk, and 11 minutes to take the train. The times are shown at the bottom of the map on the information display on the landing between A gates and the train station.

emGRGRzNgzNs4lKXgocDg.clue: Check the travel time display between Concourse A and the train station. Is it faster to walk or take the train to C gates?

answer.details:
The languages are:

- Arabic
- Chinese
- English
- Japanese
- Korean
- Russian
- Spanish
- Vietnamese

geEFxTD8QpniO60DO11lZ.clue: Ride the blue train to the South Satellite. How many languages are shown on the "Please hold on" digital sign?

hHG1YkBJ-5u50FkJ8PVh0.clue: Take a photo of a live plant.

answer.answer: Three fish are carrying suitcases, and eight planes have fins.
answer.details:
The fish are located:

- Across from Gate B3
- At the bottom of the ramp near the nursing pod
- At the top of the B train station escalators.

The planes are located:

- Near Gate B3 (three planes)
- Near Gate B6
- Near Gate B7/B7A
- Near the seats at the bottom of the ramp (three planes)

post-security-page.introduction1: Welcome to SEA! This scavenger hunt helps you explore the entire airport. How many items can you find?
post-security-page.introduction2: All answers and items can be found in public spaces. There is no need to go through any doors, and don't accidentally exit to the pre-security side of the airport when hunting for items!
post-security-page.introduction3: Your answers are stored locally in your browser and are never sent to a server.
post-security-page.title: SEA scavenger hunt
